title: Don't Need to Be Them by The Sun Days (2015)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
You will find life is fine
Just not quite like on TV
If you want, if you wish
I will show you everything
You can go away
And never turn your back
And I say it time and again
I say it time and again

[Chorus]
You don't need to be them
(Ooo aahhhh)
You don't need to be them
(Ooo aahhhh)
You don't need to be them
(Ooo aahhhh)
You don't need to be them, ooo
(Ooo aahhhh)

[Verse 2]
You will find life is fine
Just not quite like on TV
If you want, if you wish
I will show you everything
Do you want, do you want, do you want to go?
Do you want, do you want me to show?
Do you want, do you want, do you want to go?
Everything is yours and your own

[Bridge]
One more day
Try not to give in to what they say
One more day
Try not to give in to what they say

[Chorus]
You don't need to be them
(Ooo aahhhh)
You don't need to be them
(Ooo aahhhh)
You don't need to be them
(Ooo aahhhh)
You don't need to be them, ooo
(Ooo aahhhh)
